pr_title: Add Default Log Options to Search Client Builders

timeline.message: Add default log options to builders and move builder pipeline creation into a common method

timeline.bodyText: What's the reason of using Supplier here? The list has been loaded anyway which execute the class.
timeline.author: sima-zhu

replies.bodyText: We need to return a new reference from the methods on the builders otherwise it will change the default global. This could have been a method as well but I put it into Constants so a Supplier seems more reasonable.
replies.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.bodyText: Whether to allow this seems not settle yet. Can we hide it first?
timeline.author: sima-zhu

timeline.message: Remove select from the allowed query parameters list
